item.title: RPI Service Day | Oct. 4
item.description: Date: Saturday, October 4, 2025 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A day of community service open to the entire RPI community to volunteer at a variety of organizations across the Capital Region and on RPI campus.

item.title: CCPD & M/E Engineering Info Session | Oct. 7
item.description: M/E Engineering will be hosting an info session on-campus on Tuesday, October 7th from 5:30-7:30pm to discuss their available and upcoming opportunities, including positions for December graduates. Join the CCPD in learning more about the company and network with recruiters! Register and learn more in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: Lally Rally | Oct. 15
item.description: Join Epsilon Delta Sigma for the Lally Rally on Wednesday, October 15th from 1–3 PM on the 5th Floor of the Pittsburgh Building. The event will feature a State of the School Address from Dean Wagman, interactive round table discussions, and a Mario Kart tournament. Food will be provided. Don’t miss this opportunity to engage with the Lally community, share your insights, and connect with fellow students in a fun and welcoming environment.

item.title: Graduate School Application Essay Workshop | Oct. 8
item.description: Are you Applying to Graduate Schools? Come to the Student Success Center on Wednesday, October 8 from 3:00 pm – 4:00 pm for help a personal statement and statement of purpose writing workshop. Location: Beta Classroom, Folsom Library, 1st Floor. Register here

item.title: RPI Food Recovery Intro General Body Meeting | Oct. 2
item.description: Thursday, October 2, 2025 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM - Join FRN this Thursday, Oct 2nd, at 5pm in the Union Phalanx Room (3502) for our Intro General Body Meeting. We are a low commitment, high impact club here that gets rid of our food waste and donates to the Troy community. Learn more about RPI Food Recovery Network and how you can volunteer with us,or just come for the free pizza! Interested in getting involved? Join our Discord Server
item.author: Community

item.title: Free Flu Shots for Students
item.description: The Student Health Center will be hosting flu shot clinics across campus the week of 10/6: Monday in DCC; Tuesday in the Union; Wednesday in ECAV. Don’t miss this opportunity to protect yourself from seasonal influenza. Cost: no charge! Benefit: no missed classes due to the flu!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer Faculty and Staff In Person Workshop - Deeper Dive into the Active Learning Approaches of Jigsaw, Think/Pair/Share, & Visual Maps | Oct. 14
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, October 14, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - In this workshop, we will focus on the three active learning concepts of the Jigsaw activity, Think/Pair/Share and working with Visual Maps/Charts. We will spend some time on each of these three approaches, discussing the concept of each and looking at examples to help you think about how you might be able to incorporate the approach into your class as an activity. Please register using the Event URL in the See section of the calendar event.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
